long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AirReview makes your life easier as an Airbnb host and investor. 

With the extension installed, you can do the following:

‚ö°  See average income for any Airbnb property - just need to click the ‚ÄúGet listing data‚Äù button

‚ö°  Screen guests easier by scanning the reviews they‚Äôve left other hosts. This helps improve your hospitality and avoid negative reviews

‚ö°  Measure your listing‚Äôs revenue performance easier by seeing new charts in the calendar views

üèÜ  AirReview was featured on Forbes as a must-have hosting tool as well! https://www.forbes.com/sites/sethporges/2017/07/27/all-airbnb-hosts-should-use-this-chrome-extension-for-screening-guests/?sh=7a6319474081

Install the extension & our quickstart guide will guide you the rest of the way

AirReview is a part of Rankbreeze.com. Our mission is to help you build, grow and optimize your guest channels. 

Rankbreeze is best known for our Airbnb search rankings & optimization tools, including A/B testing, competitor metrics, and more. 

Visit https://rankbreeze.com/airreview to learn more
